thread.section_title: DXL Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DXL | destinationxl.com
thread.title: Ronald Mers

author: Ronald Mers
title: Ronald Mers
text: I ordered 2 pair of pants which were shown to be in inventory at my local DXL, just 5 minutes from my house. It has now been 5+ hours and still no email to notify me they are ready from pickup. what exactly needs to take place that would take this long to pull 2 pair of pants off a rack ...that would require 5+ hours? I am tempted to cancel my order and just drive down to the store and buy them right now with no waiting. Note to self...NEVER USE IN STORE PICK UP option -- it only delays your purchase.
